channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: How to Take Long Exposure Photos on a Samsung Galaxy Phone
item.dc:creator: Joe Fedewa
item.description: You can take long exposure photos with your Samsung phone.
item.content:encoded: Long-exposure photos always look super impressive. You might wonder what kind of high-tech camera was used to do it. Well, you don't need a fancy camera—you can take long-exposure photos with your Samsung Galaxy phone.

item.title: What Does That Hole in Your Subwoofer Do?
item.dc:creator: Sydney Butler
item.description: How one clever feature takes your subwoofer's performance to the next level
item.content:encoded: Have you ever looked at a subwoofer, or a speaker cab containing a woofer and wondered what that hole or slot is for? Obviously, since pretty much every subwoofer has one, it must have an important function, but what?

item.title: Amazon's Fire TV Stick 4K Is Half-Off Today
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.description: Take full advantage of your huge TV.
item.content:encoded: Amazon's Fire TV streaming devices are hugely popular. And they're even better when they're discounted. The Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K, the newest model, is currently half off, and a great deal if you want a basic streaming stick for your 4K TV.

item.title: 5 Ways I Organize My Favorite Songs and Playlists in Apple Music
item.dc:creator: Tim Brookes
item.description: You can even pin playlists and artists now.
item.content:encoded: Apple Music is the only subscription I’ve kept active for a decade or more. To say I was pleased to see Apple add some improved organizational tools after ten years is an understatement.

item.title: Today Only: This Lenovo ARM Laptop Is Less Than $500 Right Now
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.description: A nice, cheap entry point for Copilot+ PCs.
item.content:encoded: We like limited-time deals because they're an impulse buyer's best friend—and they provide some of the best savings you can find outside of specific shopping holidays. If you've ever wanted to check out a Windows 11 ARM laptop, this might be one of the best deals you can find.

item.title: System76's Cosmic Desktop Arrives in Pop!_OS 24.04 Beta
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: The Gnome Shell replacement is shaping up.
item.content:encoded: System76 just dropped the long-awaited beta release for its Pop!_OS 24.04 LTS operating system. It's coming bundled with the beta milestone of the COSMIC desktop environment. COSMIC is designed to replace the customized GNOME Shell that Pop!_OS used to use, and it's built from scratch in Rust.

item.title: Calibre Will Answer Your Questions About Books
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: Just pick the text you want to know more about and ask away.
item.content:encoded: Calibre has officially released version 8.11.1, and the biggest feature is a brand-new tab in the e-book viewer's dictionary lookup panel that lets you talk to an AI about the e-book. This should give you a quick, contextual answer, summary, or explanation without having to leave the application.

item.title: Your Excel Workbook Needs a Dynamic, Visual Table of Contents
item.dc:creator: Tony Phillips
item.description: This Excel navigation aid is sure to impress your coworkers.
item.content:encoded: One way to make your Microsoft Workbook easier to navigate is to include a table of contents. However, you could go one step further and create a table of contents containing linked thumbnails of the worksheets in your workbook.

item.title: These 8 Apps Make Android Auto Even Better
item.dc:creator: Cory Gunther
item.description: Do more and have fun in your vehicle with these Android Auto apps.
item.content:encoded: Android Auto has made it easier to interact safely with phone features, which is why most people use it for maps, navigation, or making phone calls. But that's not all it can do. If you want to improve your commute or road trips, you'll want to check out these awesome Android Auto apps.

item.title: Arzopa's Portable Monitors and Digital Frames Impress at IFA 2025
item.dc:creator: Sponsored
item.description: This post is sponsored by Arzopa.
item.content:encoded: Every year, thousands of exciting new consumer products are shown off at IFA in Berlin, which makes it hard for anything to catch the eye of the media or the public, but Arzopa managed to stand out in the already-crowded world of portable monitors with some truly impressive examples, and a few interesting digital frames to top it all off.
